Sec. 7. Persons under arrest must be dealt with
properly in all cases. It is the duty of a Police
Officer to keep prisoners safely, but he has no rightf
to punish them, and he must not even use language)
to them calculated to provoke or offend them, for I
such conduct would create a resistance on the part
of the prisoners, and a hostile feeling among bystanders towards the Police.
FELONIES.
Sec. 8. Felonies are offences for which the of]
fender, on conviction, shall be liable by law to be
punished with death, or by imprisonment in the)
